info.title: REST APIs for Automation - V2 Endpoints
info.description: Swagger file containing only the V2 endpoints for Process Automation.

post.description:
The purpose of this API is to add a Lock of a specific type to a specific User ID. Covers MT5, Cashier and Unwelcome Login Locks.

Authentication: not required

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Add lock V2 input

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication credentials are missing or invalid.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed to access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description:
The purpose of this API is to add a new remark text for a specific user.

Authentication: not required

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Add remarks V2 input

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication credentials are missing or invalid.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed to access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description:
The purpose of this API is to check if the specific User ID exists against an external 3rd party provided watchlist.

Authentication: not required

parameters.name: brand_code
parameters.description: Denotes that the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The top level User ID to perform the Sanctions List check against.

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

parameters.name: watch_list
parameters.description: Watch list paremeter with which user will be screened

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication credentials are missing or invalid.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed to access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description:
The purpose of this API is to retrieve the balance across all accounts held for a specific User ID.

Authentication: not required

parameters.name: brand_code
parameters.description: Denotes the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The top level User ID to identify all accounts for which a consolidated balance is required.

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication credentials are missing or invalid.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed to access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Split String into Array of Objects
get.description: Splits a comma-separated string into an array of objects, each with a 'name' property.

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of arguments to split.

200.description: Successful response with an array of objects.

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

brand_code.description: Denotes the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

workflow_id.description: An alpha-numeric ID to relate the remark to a specific instance of a workflow.

user_id.description: The top level User ID against which the remarks will be added.

remarks_text.description: The remarks text to be stored.

log_level.description: This defines where to store the remarks, xano, BE or both.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

brand_code.description: Denotes the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

user_id.description: The top level User ID to identify all accounts to be disabled

remarks.description: The reason for adding the lock.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

brand_code.description: Denotes the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

user_id.description: The top level User ID to against which Proof of Ownership is to be added.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

brand_code.description: Denotes the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

user_id.description: The ID against which the lock will be added. For the MT5 lock, this is the MT5_LOGIN_ID. For the Cashier lock, this is the ACCOUNT_ID.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

message.description: A message indicating the result of the operation.

brand_code.description: Denotes that the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

user_id.description: The top level User ID against which the lock will be added.

remarks.description: The reason for adding the lock.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

brand_code.description: Denotes the brand to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

channel_code.description: Denotes that the channel to notify the client via. Values include: EMAIL, INTERCOM

user_id.description: The top level User ID against which the remarks will be added.

notification_text.description: The notifications text to be stored.

notification_event.description: The notifications event to be stored.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

message.description: A message indicating the result of the notification.

id.description: The ID of the newly created remark.

sanction_exists.description: Indicates if a sanction exists (0: No, 1: Yes)

message.description: A message indicating the result of the operation.

id.description: The ID of the workflow that was updated.

related_account_identfier.description: An identifier for a related account (e.g., user_id_sharer).

user_id_owner.description: The user ID of the owner.

user_id_sharer.description: The user ID of the account sharer, if applicable.

analysis_id.description: The unique ID for the analysis performed.

user_id.description: The user ID associated with the duplicate account check.
The user ID validated as owner.

recommended_duplicate_user_id.description: The recommended duplicate user ID if a potential duplicate is found.

associated_duplicate_user_id_list.description: A comma-separated list of associated duplicate user IDs.

confidence_level.description: The confidence level of the duplication check, as a percentage.

regulated_account_included.description: Indicates if a regulated account is included in the duplicate check.

brand.description: The brand associated with the user.

explanation.description: An explanation of the duplicate check result.

result_set_id.description: The ID of the result set for this check.

created_by.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

workflow_id.description: The ID of the workflow where the error occurred.

workflow_name.description: The name of the workflow where the error occurred.

step_name.description: The name of the workflow step where the error occurred.

brand_code.description: Denotes the brand related to the error. Values include: V1 or V2

user_id.description: The top level User ID associated with the error.

id.description: The ID of the newly created log entry.
